messages.title: A strong, local champion...
messages.content: Claire Kelley would be a strong champion for local people as our next MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will protect our NHS with care pressure attestation of the situation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race here... Labour can't win.

issues.economy: Conservative plans will freeze the wages of local nurses, teachers and public workers - while giving a tax cut for millionaires.
issues.education: Claire has served as a school governor since 1992 - first at Oatlands Infant School and currently chair of St Aidan's CoE High.
issues.environment: One of the worst recycling rates in the country - Harrogate Council was ranked 333rd out of 394 councils in England.
issues.governance: Years of failure, Liberal Democrats offer real change.
issues.health: Will protect our NHS with care pressure attestation of the situation.
issues.socialWelfare: Claire has fought for the National Association for the Welfare of Children in Hospital. She ran a three year outreach at Harrogate Hospital.

housing.content: Failed to meet affordable housing targets with most for people to live.

leaflet.personalStatement: Claire Kelley has a proven track record of fighting for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Served as local councillor, both on Harrogate Borough and North Yorkshire Council for many years.

endorsements.endorsement: I have worked closely with Claire Kelley for years. Claire cares passionately about our area and I know that she would be a first class MP for local people.

quotes.text: It's Lib Dem Claire or Conservative's former PR man.

images.caption: Claire Kelley with local Liberal Democrats championing local issues.
